name: hibb-faceted-search
description: Faceted search library from Huygens ING.

scripts.link: npm link funcky.el funcky.util funcky.req funcky.arr hibb-pagination
scripts.unlink: npm unlink funcky.el funcky.util funcky.req funcky.arr hibb-pagination && npm i
scripts.commit:bump: git add -A && git commit -m "Bump to $npm_package_version" && git tag $npm_package_version
scripts.patch: node ./write-changelog.js patch && npm --no-git-tag-version version patch && npm run commit:bump && git push && git push --tags && npm publish
scripts.minor: node ./write-changelog.js minor && npm --no-git-tag-version version minor && npm run commit:bump && git push && git push --tags && npm publish
scripts.major: node ./write-changelog.js major && npm --no-git-tag-version version major && npm run commit:bump && git push && git push --tags && npm publish
